author: macdonst
msg: Fixing issue where Camera returned a content URI that File Reader could not read

author: paulb777@yahoo.com
msg: 1. Split out js to main.js 2. Show a contact 3. Toggle accelerometer 4. More device info  5. Enable scrolling

author: bcurtis
msg: Re-enable multitasking in onResume Java callback so that onResume JS handlers are called - it was being re-enabled too soon.

author: bcurtis
msg: If multitasking is turned on (keepRunning=true), then temporarily disable it when starting a new activity that returns a result - such as camera.

author: bcurtis
msg: Update version number to 0.9.3 in preparation for next release.
